alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nassau, north central Baker, northern Duval and southeastern Charlton Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 628 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Taylor, or 21 miles southwest of Hilliard, moving east at 45 mph. Another storm was 8 miles west to northwest of the Jacksonville International Airport moving east around 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fernandina Beach, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Yulee, Mayport, Cisco Gardens, St. George, Amelia City, Little Talbot Island and Fort Caroline. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
